segments.text: Besides salary what kind of allowance can I expect ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have a kind of floating bonus on a yearly basis .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you elaborate it more concretely ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Floating bonus is the kind of bonus that is indeterminate in amount , such as quarterly bonus , bonus at the end of the year .
segments.speaker: S2
